author: Gazi Abbas Shahid
title: 'PM Modi Stopped World War III; Putin, Ukraine Look Up To Him For Guidance': Kangana Ranaut At Poll Rally | WATCH
text: []https://www.india.com/maharashtra/bjp-election-commission-maharashtra-congress-leader-vijay-wadettiwar-over-rss-cop-killed-hemant-karkare-remark-ujjwal-nikam-26-11-mumbai-terror-attack-ajmal-kasab-lok-sabha-election-2024-6906293/ By clicking ‚ÄúAccept All Cookies‚Äù, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts Cookies Policy . Lok Sabha Election 2024: Actor-turned politician and BJP‚Äôs candidate for Himachal Pradesh‚Äôs Mandi Lok Sabha constituency, Kangana Ranaut, has claimed that top world leaders, including Russian President Vladimir Putin as well as the people of Ukraine ‚Äúlook up‚Äù to Prime Minister Narendra Modi for ‚Äúguidance‚Äù and he (Modi) is the reason that a third World War has not occured yet. ‚ÄúFrom Vladimir Putin to the people of Ukraine, they keep looking up to him (Modi) to provide them with guidance. And, perhaps this is a reason why World War III has not happened,‚Äù Kangana claimed while addressing poll rally recently. Ukraine looks up to Modi for guidance, It is because of Modi that World War 3 hasn't happened yet ‚Äì Kangana Ranaut [pic.twitter.com/KpDMYKjTfE] ‚Äî Roshan Rai (@RoshanKrRaii) [May 6, 2024] The ‚ÄòTejas‚Äô actor asserted that PM Modi openly speaks in favour of world peace, and claimed ‚Äúwe have never seen the image of India that we have today.‚Äù ‚ÄúDo we still need to think who we should vote for?‚Äù she asked. Meanwhile, Ranaut made a blatant gaffe at another election rally on Friday, mistaking her own party colleague Tejasvi Surya for RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav. Addressing a gathering in the Sundernagar area of Himachal Pradesh‚Äôs Mandi on Friday, Ranaut ‚Äî the BJP candidate from the Mandi Lok Sabha seat ‚Äî while referring to the INDIA bloc, said the opposition alliance is full of ‚Äúspoiled princes‚Äù. ‚ÄúBigde hue shehzadon ke ek party hai, chahe woh Rahul Gandhi ho jayen, jinhe chand mein aaloo ugane ho; Tejasvi Surya ho jayen, jo apni gunda-gardi karte hai, machli uchal uchal ke khate hai (There is a party of spoiled princes like Rahul Gandhi who wants to grow potatoes on the moon or Tejasvi Surya who does hooliganism and shows off while eating fish)‚Ä¶,‚Äù Kangana said while apparently targeting former Bihar deputy chief minister Tejashwi Yadav, but mistakenly naming BJP‚Äôs Bangalore South MP and candidate Tejasvi Surya. üö® Exclusive Kangana Ranaut said that Tejashwi Surya does hooliganism and eats fish. BJP has made her its candidate, who doesn't know the difference between Tejasvi Yadav and Tejasvi Surya ü§£ [#KanganaRanaut] [#TejasviSurya] [pic.twitter.com/YN0UvuplOi] ‚Äî Harsh Tiwari (@harsht2024) [May 4, 2024] Kangana‚Äôs faux pas became the fuel for humorous memes and jokes on social media as netizens poked fun at her for her ‚Äòslip of tongue‚Äô. The blooper also triggered a response from Yadav on X. (With PTI inputs) For breaking news and live news updates, like us on India News on India.com .
